title: Filter or Compensate: Towards Invariant Representation from Distribution Shift for Anomaly Detection
details: Z Chen, X Luo, W Wang, Z Zhao, F Su, A Men - arXiv preprint arXiv:2412.10115, 2024
abstract: Recent Anomaly Detection (AD) methods have achieved great success with In- Distribution (ID) data. However, real-world data often exhibits distribution shift, causing huge performance decay on traditional AD methods. From this perspective …
